attributes.action: have jade goody banned from media including newspapers,televison and radio broadcasting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: jade goody is a racist and should not be described as a celebrity of any dicript or seen as an influence or ambassador for the great british public until she is better educated about different cultures.i do not believe that jade meant to be so insulting but in light of the recent celebrity big brother, her lack of cultural knowledge could be seen as offensive and somewhat influential to how we should percieve different cultures

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
